document.masterDocTitle: Scale insects (Hemiptera: Coccoidea) associated with avocado crop, Persea americana Mill. (Lauraceae) in Valle del Cauca and neighboring departments of Colombia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Scale insects (Hemiptera: Coccoidea) associated with avocado crop, Persea americana Mill. (Lauraceae) in Valle del Cauca and neighboring departments of Colombia

Distribution. Afrotropical: Kenya , Reunion, Seychelles , South Africa , Tanzania , Zanzibar . Australasian: Australia , Cook Islands , Fiji , French Polynesia (Tahiti), Guam , Hawaiian Islands (Hawaii), Indonesia ( Java ), Kiribati ; New Caledonia , Norfolk Island , Northern Mariana Islands , Palau ; Papua New Guinea , Solomon Islands , Vanuatu , Western Samoa . Nearctic: USA . Neotropical: Colombia , Guadeloupe, Haiti , Martinique, Puerto Rico . Oriental: China , India , Malaysia , Maldives , Philippines , Ryukyu Islands, Sri Lanka , Taiwan , Vietnam . Palaearctic: China , Egypt , Hungary , Japan , South Korea ( Ben-Dov et al. 2015 ).

Remarks. We found the red wax scale,
C. rubens
on the upper surface of leaves of ‘Booth 7’, ‘Booth 8’, ‘Choquette’, ‘Lorena’ and ‘Trinidad’ cultivars. This species was recorded for the first time in Colombia on leaves of the ornamental plants
Philodendron
sp. and
Aglaonema
sp. ( Araliaceae ) (Kondo 2008).
